text: aisee nahin guzaree ki usake paas (hamaara) daraane vaala paigambar na aaya ho aur agar ye log tumhen jhuthalaen to kuchh paravaah nahin karo kyonki inake agalon ne bhee (apane paigambaron ko) jhuthalaaya hai (haalaanki) unake paas unake paigambar vaazee va raushan maujije aaur saheefe aur raushan kitaab lekar aae the
